Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Features

• Mongoose Hi-Ten BMX frame and fork is comfortable and fits modern BMX geometry; top tube measures 20.5" long

• 25x9t gearing with cassette driver and durable 3-piece tubular cromo 170 mm cranks with sealed mid bottom bracket

• Front alloy caliper front brake and rear U-brake combine with the 360 Degree brake rotor for tangle-free braking and rad bar spins

• Stay in control with the Mongoose 8 3/4" handlebars and the Mongoose top loader 50mm threadless stem

• Light and strong alloy rims add crucial durability without weighing you down

title: Scott Spark 910
text: Selling my much loved Scott Spark 910 (Large)The bike has some upgrades, and has been meticulously maintained by myself, and Knipe Racing over the time I've owned the bike.I've serviced all the rear pivots and packed the bearings with fresh grease, checked and regreased the crankset, bled the brakes, installed a new 180 rotor and fresh pads on the rear, and serviced the headset in December 2022.Bike was washed after every 2nd short ride or after every long ride. Stanchions where cleaned and oiled before/after every ride (First Line Stanchion Lube or Brunox Deo).Reason for selling: I downgraded to an aluminium short travel trail bike.Specs:HMF Carbon Frame (Large) with Aluminium Rear Triangle.Fox 34 Performance Elite (120mm Travel) Air Fork with Remote Lockout (Scott Twin Lock).Fox Nude E-Vol Rear Shock with Remote Lockout (Scott Twin Lock).Shimano XT M8100 12 Speed Rear Derailleur.Shimano XT Brakes with 180mm Rotors front and Rear.Fox Transfer Dropper Seat PostSyncros Carbon Reinforced SeatSyncros Handlebar (760mm Wide)Syncros StemMaxxis Tyres front and rear (good condition).Upgraded/Aftermarket parts on the bike:Bongrager Kovee TLR 28mm OD, 22.5mm ID wheels (Boost front & Rear with Thru-Axle, nice sounding Microspline Hub)Truvativ Stylo Carbon Dub Crankset (170mm).SRAM Crank boots.Csixx Oval 34T Chainring (installed around 600km back).Csixx Dropper Lever.Csixx Mudguard/Fender.Csixx Stem cap.Spank Dual lock ring grips (need replacing soon).There is some clear frame protection on the frame in key locations as well (Chainstay, Downtube, Cable entry points on Headset area).Recent Maintenance/Work Done:Fork was rebuilt, including stanchions and steerer tube pushed out of CSU, cleaned and reassembled with loctite type product, this included all seals, o-rings, wipers, etc (I.e. Full rebuild) - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)Rear shock was fully rebuilt (new seal, o-rings, etc) - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)Brand new inner cables for shifter & Lockout system - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)True rear wheel + New sealant - Knipe Racing (24/03/2023)New sealant front - 21/04/2023The bike is in great condition and rides like a dream, some regular MTB marks here and there, and a scratch on the top tube (I bought it like that).

title: Trek Roscoe 24” bicycle as new!
text:
Trek Roscoe 24inch with 8 gears 2023 model 
Less than two months old! 
Retail: 10k retail plus spent R1500 spent extra on it = R11,500.
Selling: R8500.
Disc brakes, absolutely no wear on the tyres. A very smooth ride.  Larger red pedals added bling, a larger, cushioned Romero seat added, wheels puncture proofed - and lower chain frame rubber-wrapped.
Bought in an emergency on the eve of my son’s birthday only to find I was supposed to buy a 26”! It is such a stunning bike I have tears in my eyes! https://www.trekbikes.com/za/en_ZA/bikes/mountain-bikes/kids-mountain-bikes/roscoe-kids/roscoe-24/p/33491/?colorCode=bluelight  Roscoe 24 is a kids' mountain bike designed to build confidence on the trail. It takes cues from the adult Roscoe, but this ride was built from the ground up for kids. 2.8˝ mid-fat tyres, a 1x drivetrain and a wide-range cassette make Roscoe the ideal bike for little rippers who want to build skills and have a ridiculous amount of fun keeping up with Mum, Dad or an older sibling. Fit for riders 4’3” - 4’11” (129.5 -150 cm) tall.
Collection constantia or can drop in central Cape Town. Whatsapp Claire 0760118734. Instant efts preferred, or cash.

This lightweight ALUXX aluminum frameset features classic off-road design made specifically for 27.5 wheels to strike just the right balance between control and quickness. title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text:
Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.
Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.
E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :
1. Type of terrain.
2. Torque.
3. Speed.
4. Range.
5. Frame size.
6. Weight.
7. Riding preferences .
Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:

Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)
Your height ( right frame size )
Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)


WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:
1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :

You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.
Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?
Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.


2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATION

Your bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .
In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .


3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITY

Choices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.
Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.
A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.


4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICE

S.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.
We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.
Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.
100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

title: 2019 Specialized M4 RockHOPPER 26er Mountain Bike
text:
2019 Specialized M4 RockHOPPER 26er Mountain Bike

Technical Specifications:

* Colour: Gloss Metallic Light Purple 
* Size: 15"
* Best Hardtail for any rider looking for thrills and adventure
* M4 Alloy Frame and premium specs deliver category-leading efficiency, value and dependable handling
* Headset: Specialized 1-1/8"" threadless, loose ball
* Seat Specialized Gel
* Suspension and Fork: RockShox Recon SLite, 100mm, alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions
* Wheels and Rims:Specialized  445D, 26", double wall disc, pin joint w/ eyelets, 28/32h
* Rims: ALEXrims
* Front Hub: Specialized Hi Lo, forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, 28h
Rear Hub: Specialized, forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, cassette, QR, 32h
* Spokes: 1.8mm (15g) stainless
* Tyres: Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0"", 60TPI, aramid bead, 2 Bliss ready
* Inner Tubes: Specialized schraeder Valve
* Drivetrain Front Derailleur: Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, bottom swing, dual pull
* Rear Derailleur: Deore XT Med. cage
* Shift Levers: Deore XT, 9-speed trigger
* Cassette: Shimano HG-50, 9-speed, 11-34t
* Chain: KMC X9SL w/reuseable Missing Link
* Crankset: Shimano Deore FC-M532, 2pc design, replaceable rings w/alloy outer
* Chainrings: 44A x 32S x 22S
* Bottom Braket: Shimano BB-ES25, Octalink spline, cartridge bearings, 68mm x 118mm
* Stem: Specialized 3D forged, 4-bolt, 7 degree rise, 31.8mm clamp
* Handlebars: Specialized Butted Alloy, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 8 degree up, 2.6mm thick
* Grips: Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
* Saddle: Specialized Indie XC, Body Geometry, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
* Seatpost: Specialized alloy two bolt, double butted, micro adjust head, 30.9mm
* Front and Rear Brakes: Avid Juicy 3 SL Hydraulic disc, caliper/adapter w/ 160mm G2 Clean
* Bike Retails for R 5 000 or more 
* In Excellent Overall Condition
* Frame and bike is flawless
* Hardly used.

title: CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC | E-BIKE CONVERSIONS | SEND  YOUR BIKE FOR CONVERSION TO  ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. title: Fat bike beach e - monster 2 kw
text:
Tame this 2 kw e fat bike beast and search natures play grounds - beach and mountain trails - in fantastic comfort and all at your own speed.


We can build you a new fat bike or you can send us your existing bike and then we add an e - kit of your choice - 1 000 watt, 1500 watt or the  killer 2 000 watt monster.


The fun and exhilaration of the wind in your hair and the wonders of nature will have you back on your bike again and again!!


Give us a shout and lets put you on your way to amazing adventures and never ending beach rides.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and we can plan your escape from suburban boredom into natures magic delights!!


Cheers


Michael

title: Explore your dream beach on a fat bike
text:
Take this fat bike beaut anywhere you choose - as long as can dream of a place, you can go there with this fully tested Cape West Coast monster fat  bike - beach or farm roads!
This will be the most fun you have ever had on a bike on your favourite beach or you could fit out your fat bike  for some serious fishing trips.
You can go full crazy and let us fit your existing fat bike or one built by us with an electric motor and battery - ultimate mean beach machine with no limits on your fun!!
You owe it to yourself to join this group of e bike beach roamers who only wish they had done this years ago!!
Give us a call and let us get you out there on the beach where you belong!!

Call or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907

title: Fat bike mean dream beach machine
text:
This Cape West Coast battle tested beach fat bike beast is snugly at home on the rugged sun ravaged West Coast shoreline or swaggering along the scorching West Coast farm tracks that only giant Cape Cobras nonchalantly saunter along.
We build the mean machine according to your hardcore conditions leaving you with a beautifully crafted killer machine primed to thrill you and dare you - every time you hit the trail and take on nature's wild challenge - again and again!!
We can turbo boost your adrenaline to Mars with an e bike kit on your existing bike  that will blow your mind - you set the limit and we create the magic!
Give us a shout or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907 and we can chat.

title: Mountain e Bike Rocket Beast!
text:
Mountain Bike mean machine -   let your e bike rip up those mountain tracks and explore those farm roads.
Feel the raw power and experience the beauty of nature as your e bike takes you wherever your imagination chooses to fly to.
We can take your existing bike or we can build up a bike for you then attach your choice of e bike kit.

title: 2 kw  E Fat Bike Beach Monster
text:
Explode your fun limits and blow your adrenaline reserves on a 2 kw e fat bike that will fly you to your leisure hideaway's , secret fishing spot's or just ripping along an obscure bush track.


With 40 km and upward range to take you  places at a pace of your choice.


Enjoy the wonders of nature with the eco friendly beach and trail e fat bike machine.


Give me a shout and together we can put together a personal dream machine for your spectacular pleasure and effortless journey seeking nature's bountiful hidden treasures - all at your pace and direction.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and I will send you all the info and pic's you will need to start your flight into your imagination and beyond!

title: Mountain e bike trail ripper
text:
Super charge your existing mountain bike with a 1000 watt, 1500 watt or the insane 2 000 watt e bike motor that will blast you from your comfy couch into the wild outdoors.


Take effortlessly to the many trails nature intended you to travel - inhale the freshest air with wild abandon and delight in the tranquil beauty of natures bounty - just a hop and a skip from the suburban nightmare!


Be finally free to roam the vast trails, all at your speed and your leisure soaking up the sunshine and atmosphere patiently waiting just for you and your e bike.


We can transform your existing bike or build a new bike into an e bike machine that will allow you to take flight and explore.


Do not hesitate, give me a shout on whatsapp 071 811 2907 and lets get you into those cycle shorts!!


Cheers


Michael

Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000!
